thread.title: Great location for everything good in London!
thread.title_full: Great location for everything good in London! - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London - West End, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: PaulNTanner
title: Great location for everything good in London!
text: Really nice hotel, with stylish bar, great rooms and very helpful and friendly staff. 10 minutes walk from all theatres and Oxford street. I would highly recommend this hotel to both business guests and tourists - I can't see a better combination of quality and price
